summary: it is really bad and rubbish

description:
I wanted to be nice since I thought the reviews were likely just being unfair, and that's part of the reason I gave it two stars instead of one, but I just don't think that in the game's current state it is enjoyable or recommendable, and I say that as someone who has played plenty of open source games with questionable quality.

When I started up the game, it immediately dropped me into the campaign. I thought maybe this campaign would serve as a tutorial, but if that was the intention it sure doesn't show. I was at least able to find out how to move and attack, but when I reached level two I only figured out I could repair units after I had blown my entire army fighting my opponent. I know people complain about tutorials that hold your hands too much, but I'd rather have one of those than no tutorial at all.

 In addition to that, GUI elements like the one that explains what a button does are located in bad places and take up miniscule amounts of the screen, while the game viewport is so big that the actual map doesn't fill up the entire screen. You've also got features like infantry that can place mines which just confuses new users IMO. A better-designed game puts the simplest units in the hands of a new user, slowly teaching them how to use all of the little features.

I give one star because I do think this could *potentially* get better, but not unless someone makes fixes to simplify everything.

Lastly, when I exited the game, it just went black and I had to switch to a TTY and kill it. A bit of a warning to anyone who wants to try it just to see if what I said was right.
summary: I thought people were trolling how bad it is

description: super game for this laptop like this gamr has improve
doesn't run. Errors out with a segmentation fault

I'm not slow to comprehension, but, it is very hard to understand and all the troops look almost exactly the same. Add that to a very complex tutorial and hard to use interfaces... if you want an easier to use BUT still very strategic game, I suggest The Battle for Wesnoth (based of The Lord of the Rings!) or Warzone 2100
